thread.title: The 2017 BAFTAs Were a Parade of Good Taste
thread.title_full: The 2017 BAFTAs Were a Parade of Good Taste

title: The 2017 BAFTAs Were a Parade of Good Taste
text: The 2017 BAFTAs Were a Parade of Good Taste X Red Carpet The 2017 BAFTAs Were a Parade of Good Taste The Grammys might have been our big star-studded show of the weekend, but across the pond in England the big-red carpet event to watch was the 2017 BAFTAs, a.k.a. the EE British Academy Film Awards. There were no rainbow grills , pink Gucci suits , or gold warrior costumes on the BAFTAs red carpet. Instead, it was all about traditional black-tie done exactly to 2017 standards: slim-cut jackets, zero-break pant hems, big bow-ties, and swanky fabrications here and there. Oh, and damn good hair. Here's who knocked it out of the park from a style perspective at the event. While we prefer the sartorial excitement of a non-formal awards show, it's hard to get mad at classic good taste. Swipe to see the photos Read More
